text: @sardesairajdeep u r far from reality. How did Covid-19 spread in Quds, Iran? Did u bother to look at the data of infected n dead people in India? 2/3 of all cases n death by Covid-19 are from a particular religion bcoz they don't give two hoots 2 govt advisory n people like u try to normalise it
